name: eggd_canrisk_vcf
title: eggd_canrisk_vcf
summary: App to convert VCF output from sentieon Haplotyper for PRS variants to a format compatible with the CANRISK tool

whatsNew.v1.1.0: Optional conversion of uncertain genotypes to 0/0, GT info added to check files and no longer output them if empty, removed exclude variants input
whatsNew.v1.1.1: Bugfix to handle male samples where GT is 0 (on X) instead of 0/0 (also ./. or .)

inputSpec.name: sample_vcf
inputSpec.help: VCF output of Sentieon-dnaseq (FASTQ>VCF). Must contain genotypes for all positions specified in the PRS file.

inputSpec.name: depth
inputSpec.label: minimum depth threshold
inputSpec.help: minimum number of reads a variant should be supported by from the VCF

inputSpec.name: convert_gt_cnv
inputSpec.label: Convert the genotypes of variants within CNVs to 0/0
inputSpec.help: whether the genotpyes of variants should be converted to 0/0 if CNV has been called in that region

inputSpec.name: convert_gt_low_dp
inputSpec.label: Convert the genotypes of low depth variants to 0/0
inputSpec.help: whether the genotpyes of low depth (specified by the minimum depth input) variants are converted to 0/0.
